plot: Schoolmasterly Greg Davies sets five fellow comedians - including Tim Key and Frank Skinner - devious tasks in this offbeat challenge show. First up: melon-eating.

Greg Davies hosts this brand new comedy show as the eponymous Taskmaster who, with arbitrary assistance and analysis from Alex Horne, sets five top comedians a series of bizarre, tricky and often ingenious tasks. With their personal possessions up for grabs, they have everything to play for. Especially their dignity.
